title: A word in due season, or, Some harvest meditations with a warning from the Lord God to all people in England, to leave off their wicked and foolish customs in their harvest, before the anger of the Lord be kindled against them, and there be no remedy.
author: Crisp, Stephen, 1628-1692.
notes: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
